name: Ayush Gairola
title: Full Stack Web Developer

summary: Forged in ambition, tempered by code, and guided by creativity—Ayush Gairola is a self-taught full-stack developer with hands-on expertise in crafting scalable systems, building impactful user experiences, and shipping production-grade applications.
highlights: Spearheaded backend development for a US-based startup, improving performance by 30%.
Built 4+ real-world full-stack apps infused with the essence of modern technology.
Optimized query loads and response times, cutting inefficiencies by up to 40%.

experience.title: Lead Backend Developer
achievements: Promoted from intern to lead developer within 2 months.
Crafted backend systems rooted in Node.js, PostgreSQL, and microservices.
Enhanced scalability and forged performance improvements of up to 30%.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
achievements: Designed and enchanted various UI components using React and Tailwind.
Improved user engagement and retention, increasing platform usage by 20%.

projects.name: Surge – Blog & Social Networking Platform
description: An enchanted blog and social networking platform to connect like-minded individuals.
Optimized queries for 25% faster data retrieval and built live chat features using Socket.io.

projects.name: MendAI – AI Therapy Assistant
description: An AI companion forged to assist and uplift souls in need.
Implemented Google's Gemini API for context-aware conversations and built efficient SQL systems for session memories.

projects.name: Yibee – Music Streaming & Social Network
description: A hybrid platform of melody and interaction, uniting music streaming with social connection.
Enhanced MongoDB queries for faster content loading and added playlist features for immersive experiences.

education.description: Learned web development through the lore of online documentation, mystical YouTube tutorials, and daring real-world projects.
